activityLogSiteDataDomainsText.description: Invoked cleanup of $siteData$ for: $domains$. Found in Activity Log Detailed Entries.

addNewExpressionNotification.description: Adding $expression$ to list type $listType$ under cookie store $cookieStore$. Used in notification when right-click action was performed.

addNewExpressionNotificationFailed.message: Nie znaleziono domeny do dodania z miejsca w którym użyto menu kontekstowe.
addNewExpressionNotificationFailed.description: Could not fetch domain to add from where right-click was issued.

addNewExpressionNotificationIgnore.message: Jeżeli formuła już istnieje, akcja zostanie zignorowana.
addNewExpressionNotificationIgnore.description: If expression already exists, this will be ignored. Used in notification when right-click action was performed.

browsingDataWarning.message: OSTRZEŻENIE: Po włączeniu którejkolwiek z następujących opcji oczyszczania danych o lokalizacji wszystkie istniejące dane dla tego typu zostaną wyczyszczone.
browsingDataWarning.description: WARNING: Upon enabling any of the following site data cleanup options, ALL existing data for that type will be cleared. Found in CAD Settings

cacheCleanupText.description: Enable Cache Cleanup (Firefox 78+, Chrome 74+). Found in CAD Settings.

chromeDebugMode.message: Upewnij się, że 'Tryb programisty' jest włączony, następnie kliknij na 'strona w tle' pod 'Zobacz widoki'.
chromeDebugMode.description: Ensure 'Developer Mode' is enabled, then click on 'background page' under Inspect View. This is shown if debug mode is enabled.

cleanDiscardedText.description: Enable Cleanup for Discarded/Unloaded Tabs. Found in Settings.

cleanExpiredCookiesText.description: Clean All Expired Cookies. Found in Settings.

cleanIgnoringOpenTabsText.description: Clean, include open tabs. Found in the additional cleanup options in the popup.

cleanupActionsBypass.description: Warning - Actions below ignore settings! Found in the additional cleanup options in the popup.

consoleDebugMode.description: Click on the Console Tab. Found after enabling debug mode.

containerSiteDataWarning.message: OSTRZEŻENIE: Włączenie kart kontenerów z którymkolwiek z dodatkowych oczyszczania danych przeglądania może powodować niepożądane działania niepożądane ze względu na ograniczenia API przeglądarki. Typy danych witryny, z wyjątkiem plików cookie, zostaną wyczyszczone przez nazwę hosta dla WSZYSTKICH kontenerów.
containerSiteDataWarning.description: WARNING: Enabling Container Tabs with any of the additional browsing data cleanups above may cause unwanted side effects due to browser API limitations. Site data types, with the exception of cookies, will be cleared by hostname for ALL containers. Found in CAD Settings.

contextMenusParentClean.description: Manual Cleaning Menu. Shown on right-clicks of Page/Browser Action.

contextMenusParentExpression.description: Add Domain/Expression Menu. Shown on right-clicks of Page/Link/Selection.

contextMenusSelectedDomainLink.description: For domain only of selected link. Shown in right-click menu.

contextMenusSelectedDomainPage.description: For domain only of selected page. Shown in right-click menu.

contextMenusSelectedDomainText.message: Tylko dla domeny z zaznaczonego tekstu: $selected$
contextMenusSelectedDomainText.description: For domain only of selected text: $selected$. Shown in right-click menu.

contextMenusSelectedSubdomainLink.description: For all subdomains with domain of selected link. Shown in right-click menu.

contextMenusSelectedSubdomainPage.description: For all subdomains with domain of selected page. Shown in right-click menu.

contextMenusSelectedSubdomainText.message: Dla wszystkich subdomen z zaznaczonego tekstu: $selected$
contextMenusSelectedSubdomainText.description: For all subdomains with domain of selected text: $selected$. Shown in right-click menu.

contextualIdentitiesAutoRemoveText.message: Włącz automatyczne usuwanie listy formuł po usunięciu kontenera.
contextualIdentitiesAutoRemoveText.description: Enable Automatic Removal of Expression List when its Container is Removed. Only in Firefox.

contextualIdentitiesEnabledText.description: Enable Support for Container Tabs. Currently only in Firefox.

cookiesText.description: Cookies. Primarily used in popup via alternate clean action dropdown.

cookieCleanUpOnStartText.message: Wyczyść ciasteczka i inne dane witryny z otwartych kart podczas uruchamiania
cookieCleanUpOnStartText.description: Clean Cookies and other Site Data from Open Tabs on Startup

cookieCleanupIgnoreOpenTabsText.message: Uruchom czyszczenie teraz, dołącz domeny z otwartych kart
cookieCleanupIgnoreOpenTabsText.description: Run cleanup now, include cookies from open tabs. This is shown on mouseover from the available dropdown buttons.

cookieCleanupText.message: Uruchom czyszczenie teraz, wyklucz domeny z otwartych kart
cookieCleanupText.description: Run cleanup now, exclude domains from open tabs. This is shown on mouseover on the button.

createDefaultExpressionOptionsText.description: Create Default Expression Options. Used in 'List of Expressions'

currentContainerInfo.description: Current Container Selected: $ID$ ( $Name ). Found in List of Expressions only if Firefox containers enabled.

Name.example: Personal (whatever the user has named the container) - or - translated version of 'Invalid Container'

debugMode.message: Włącz tryb debugowania (dodatkowe komunikaty w konsoli)
debugMode.description: Enable Debug Mode (Additional Console Outputs). Found in CAD Settings.

defaultText.description: Default. Used in List of Expression in Firefox for Default / No Container.

defaultContainerText.description: No Container. This will be in brackets. Used in List of Expression in Firefox for Default / No Container

disableAutoDeleteText.message: Przełącz by wyłączyć automatyczne czyszczenie (tryb ręczny)
disableAutoDeleteText.description: Toggle to disable automatic cleanup (manual mode)

dropdownAdditionalCleaningOptions.description: (Screen-readers only) - Toggle Additional Cleaning Actions Dropdown

enableAutoDeleteText.message: Przełącz by włączyć automatyczne czyszczenie (tryb automatyczny)
enableAutoDeleteText.description: Toggle to enable automatic cleanup (automatic mode)

enableContextMenus.description: Enable Context Menus (Right-Click Menu). Shown in CAD Settings

enableGreyListCleanup.message: Włącz czyszczenie szarej listy przy restarcie przeglądarki
enableGreyListCleanup.description: Enable Greylist Cleanup on Browser Restart

enableNewVersionPopup.message: Pokazuj popup z informacjami o nowej wersji po każdej aktualizacji
enableNewVersionPopup.description: Enable Popup when New Version is Released

exportSettingsText.description: Export Core Settings... Found in CAD Settings.

exportURLSText.description: Export Expressions... Found in List of Expressions.

exportTitleTimestamp.message: Znacznik czasu zostanie dołączony do nazwy pliku przy eksporcie.
exportTitleTimestamp.description: A timestamp will be appended to the filename on export.

extensionDescription.message: Kontroluj swoje ciasteczka! Automatycznie usuwaj nieużywane ciasteczka z zamkniętych kart, zostawiając tylko te, które chcesz.
extensionDescription.description: Control your cookies! Automatically delete unwanted cookies from your closed tabs while keeping the ones you want.

faqText.message: Najczęściej zadawane pytania, wspólne kwestie i rozwiązania
faqText.description: Frequently Asked Questions, Common issues and solutions

filterDebugMode.message: By widzieć wpisy tylko tego rozszerzenia, filtruj komunikaty konsoli używając tekstu z linii poniżej:
filterDebugMode.description: To see only debug outputs by this extension, filter output by the following line. Found after enabling debug mode.

groupExpressionDefaultNotice.message: Chcesz ustawić domyślne opcje dla nowych formuł? Zostały one ulepszone - możesz je ustawić jako formuła z domyślnymi opcjami! Odwiedź $listExpression$, aby zacząć!
groupExpressionDefaultNotice.description: Looking to set default expression options for new expressions?  It has been enhanced to be an expression option itself!  Visit $listExpression$ to get started!  Shown in Settings

listExpression.example: List of Expressions <- the translated version

importCoreSettingsFailed.message: Zaimportowanie ustawień nie powiodło się - znaleziono nieznane ustawienia
importCoreSettingsFailed.description: Import Core Settings Failed - Found unknown setting

importCoreSettingsText.description: Import Core Settings... Found in CAD Settings.

importFileNotFound.description: File not found: $filename$.  Found in List of Expressions and CAD Settings.

importFileTypeInvalid.message: Podany plik nie jest w obsługiwanym formacie
importFileTypeInvalid.description: File given is not a type we handle

importInvalidExpressions.message: Wykryto nieprawidłowe formuły w importowanym pliku. Są one odnotowane poniżej z jego powodem. Sprawdź i popraw błędy w tym pliku i spróbuj ponownie zaimportować.
importInvalidExpressions.description: Detected invalid expression(s) from file import. They are noted below with its reason. Check and fix any errors in that file and try importing again. Found in List of Expressions when imported file as expressions that aren't valid.

importListNotArray.message: $identifier$ nie jest sformatowany jako lista tablic.
importListNotArray.description: $identifier$ is not formatted as an array list.  Found in List of Expressions during import validation.

importURLSText.description: Import Expressions... Found in List of Expressions.

importValidExpressions.message: Pomyślnie dodano $num$ formuł z importowanego pliku: $filename$.
importValidExpressions.description: Successfully added $num$ expression(s) from imported file: $filename$.  Found in List of Expressions after successful valid expressions from import.

indexedDBCleanupText.description: Enable IndexedDB Cleanup (Firefox 77+, Chrome 74+). Found in CAD Settings.

inputErrorComma.message: Przecinki są dozwolone tylko w wyrażeniach regularnych.
inputErrorComma.description: Commas are only allowed in Regular Expressions. Found in editing expression errors.

inputErrorEmpty.message: Zmieniona formuła nie może być pusta!
inputErrorEmpty.description: Revised expression cannot be empty!  Found in editing expression errors.

inputErrorRegExp.description: Regular Expression is not valid. <Error from new RegExp()>. Found in editing expression errors.

inputErrorSlashEndMissingStart.message: Wykryto ukośnik zakończenia, ale brakuje ukośnika startu dla wyrażenia regularnego. Usuń koniec ukośnika dla domen.
inputErrorSlashEndMissingStart.description: End slash detected, but missing start slash for Regular Expression. Remove end slash for domains. Found in editing expression errors.

inputErrorSlashStartMissingEnd.message: Wykryto ukośnik, ale brakuje końca dla wyrażenia regularnego.
inputErrorSlashStartMissingEnd.description: Start slash detected, but missing end slash for Regular Expression. Found in editing expression errors.

inputErrorSpace.message: Spacje nie są dozwolone w nazwach hostów.
inputErrorSpace.description: Spaces are not allowed in hostnames. Found in editing expression errors.

inputAddSuccess.message: Pomyślnie dodano $num$ formuł typu $listType$ do aktualnie aktywnej listy.
inputAddSuccess.description: Successfully added $num$ expression(s) to $listType$ Type in the currently active list.  Found in List of Expressions after successful inputs.

invalidNewExpressions.message: Wykryto nieprawidłowe nowe formuły. Zostały one odnotowane poniżej z jego powodem i zachowane powyżej do edycji.
invalidNewExpressions.description: Detected invalid new expression(s). They are noted below with its reason and have been kept above for editing. Found in List of Expressions Settings Page.

keepAllCookiesText.description: Keep All Cookies. Found in Expression Options. For Whitelist entries.

keepAllCookiesGreyText.description: Keep All Cookies until restart. Found in Expression Options. For Greylist entries.

keepCacheText.description: Keep Cache. Found in Expression Options. For Whitelist entries.

keepCacheGreyText.description: Keep Cache until restart. Found in Expression Options. For Greylist entries.

keepDefaultIcon.message: Użyj domyślnej ikony dla wszystkich typów list
keepDefaultIcon.description: Keep Default Icons on all list types. Disabled: keep blue icon, grey for automatic cleaning disabled. Enabled: red/yellow/blue depending on matching expressions in list.

keepIndexedDBText.description: Keep IndexedDB. Found in Expression Options. For Whitelist entries.

keepIndexedDBGreyText.description: Keep IndexedDB until restart. Found in Expression Options. For Greylist entries.

keepLocalstorageText.description: Keep LocalStorage. Found in Expression Options. For Whitelist entries.

keepLocalstorageGreyText.description: Keep LocalStorage until restart. Found in Expression Options. For Greylist entries.

keepPluginDataText.description: Keep Plugin Data. Found in Expression Options. For Whitelist entries.

keepPluginDataGreyText.description: Keep Plugin Data until restart. Found in Expression Options. For Greylist entries.

keepServiceWorkersText.description: Keep Service Workers. Found in Expression Options. For Whitelist entries.

keepServiceWorkersGreyText.description: Keep Service Workers until restart. Found in Expression Options. For Greylist entries.

localStorageCleanupText.description: Enable LocalStorage Cleanup (Firefox 58+, Chrome 74+). Found in CAD Settings.

manualActionNotification.description: Manual Action Notification - used as Notification Title.

manualCleanError.description: $siteData$ cannot be cleaned for tab:. Shown as notification if manual clean cookies cannot be done.

manualCleanNothing.description: No $siteData$ were found for cleaning on $url$. Used in notification after manual clean.

manualCleanRemoved.description: Removed $deleted$ of $total$. Used as part of success notification on manual clean.

manualCleanSiteDataAll.description: Clean All for this domain. Found in Popup clean dropdown menu.

manualCleanSiteDataAllDomain.description: Clear all site data for $domain$. Found in Popup clean dropdown menu as mouseover.

manualCleanSiteDataCache.message: Wyczyść pamięć podręczną dla tej domeny
manualCleanSiteDataCache.description: Clean Cache for this domain. Found in Popup clean dropdown menu.

manualCleanSiteDataCacheDomain.description: Clear all Cache for $domain$. Found in Popup clean dropdown menu as mouseover.

manualCleanSiteDataCookies.description: Clean Cookies for this domain. Found in Popup clean dropdown menu.

manualCleanSiteDataCookiesDomain.description: Clear all Cookies for $domain$. Found in Popup clean dropdown menu as mouseover.

manualCleanSiteDataIndexedDB.description: Clean IndexedDB for this domain. Found in Popup clean dropdown menu.

manualCleanSiteDataIndexedDBDomain.description: Clear all IndexedDB for $domain$. Found in Popup clean dropdown menu as mouseover.

manualCleanSiteDataLocalStorage.description: Clean LocalStorage for this domain. Found in Popup clean dropdown menu.

manualCleanSiteDataLocalStorageDomain.description: Clear all LocalStorage for $domain$. Found in Popup clean dropdown menu as mouseover.

manualCleanSiteDataPluginData.message: Wyczyść dane wtyczek dla tej domeny
manualCleanSiteDataPluginData.description: Clean Plugin Data for this domain. Found in Popup clean dropdown menu.

manualCleanSiteDataPluginDataDomain.description: Clear all Plugin Data for $domain$. Found in Popup clean dropdown menu as mouseover.

manualCleanSiteDataServiceWorkers.message: Wyczyść Service Workers dla tej domeny
manualCleanSiteDataServiceWorkers.description: Clean Service Workers for this domain. Found in Popup clean dropdown menu.

manualCleanSiteDataServiceWorkersDomain.description: Clear all Service Workers for $domain$. Found in Popup clean dropdown menu as mouseover.

manualCleanSuccess.description: Cleanup for $siteData$ on $url$ result:  Shown as notification after successful manual cleaning.

manualNotificationsText.message: Pokaż powiadomienia z ręcznego czyszczenia danych witryny
manualNotificationsText.description: Show Notification from Manual Site Data Cleanups. Found in settings

menuText.description: Menu. Only shown when the settings screen is small / when the hamburger icon shows / when the menu is collapsed.

missingContainerText.description: INVALID CONTAINER. Shown when a CAD list exists but cannot link id to available containers (Firefox).

noPrivateLogging.message: Logi czyszczenia nie będą generowane dla kart w trybie prywatnym
noPrivateLogging.description: Cleanup Logs will not be generated for tabs in Private Browsing / Incognito / InPrivate.

noSearchExpressionsFound.message: Nie znaleziono formuł z wyszukiwania powyżej.
noSearchExpressionsFound.description: No expressions found from search above.  Found in List of Expressions.

noRulesText.message: Brak reguł pasujących do tej domeny.

notificationContent.message: Niektóre dane strony, w tym $Num$ Cookie(s), usunięte z $total$ domen(y), w tym: $Websites$
notificationContent.description: Some site data, including 123 Cookie(s), removed from 8 domain(s), including: google.com, facebook.com

notificationTitle.description: Cookies were deleted!  Used in Notification Title.

notificationTitleSiteData.description: Site Data Removal Triggered!  Used in Notification Title.

notifyCookieCleanUpText.description: Show Notification After Automatic Cleanup. Found in settings.

oldReleasesText.message: Starsze notatki o wydaniu można oglądać online na
oldReleasesText.description: Older release notes can be viewed online at

openDebugMode.message: Aby wyświetlić komunikaty debugowania, otwórz nową kartę i przejdź do
openDebugMode.description: To view the debug outputs, open a new tab and visit

pluginDataCleanupText.description: Enable Plugin Data Cleanup (Firefox 78+, Chrome 74+). Found in CAD Settings.

pluginDataText.description: Plugin Data. Primarily used in notifications.

popupCookieCountText.description: Cookies. Due to visual formatting, Cookie Count will always be located on the right side after the colon. Found in Popup near top-right.

reasonCADSiteDataCookie.message: Usuń aby uruchomić czyszczenie danych witryny dla $hostname$.
reasonCADSiteDataCookie.description: Clean to trigger Site Data cleaning for $hostname$. Found in Activity Log Detailed Entries.

reasonCleanCookieExpired.message: Częściowo oczyszczone z powodu wygasłych ciasteczek z $hostname$.
reasonCleanCookieExpired.description: Partial clean because of expired cookies from $hostname$.

reasonCleanCookieName.message: Częściowo wyczyszczone z powodu obecności $matchedExpression$ na $listType$
reasonCleanCookieName.description: Partial clean because of matched $matchedExpression$ in the $listType$. Used in cleanup logs.

reasonCleanGreyList.message: Wyczyszczone z powodu czyszczenia na starcie oraz obecności $matchedExpression$ na szarej liście
reasonCleanGreyList.description: Clean because of startup cleanup and $matchedExpression$ is in the Greylist. Used in cleanup log.

reasonCleanNoList.message: Wyczyść ponieważ $hostname$ nie jest na białej lub szarej liście
reasonCleanNoList.description: Clean because $hostname$ is not in the White or Grey lists

reasonCleanStartupNoList.message: Wyczyść z powodu czyszczenia rozruchu i $hostname$ nie jest na białej lub szarej liście
reasonCleanStartupNoList.description: Clean because of startup cleanup and $hostname$ is not in the White or Grey lists

reasonKeep.description: Keep because of matched $matchedExpression$ in the $listType$

reasonKeepOpenTab.message: Zachowane z powodu obecności otwartych kart z *.$mainDomain$
reasonKeepOpenTab.description: Keep because of open tabs of *.$mainDomain$

reasonTabsWereIgnored.description: [Clean because of sub.google.com is not in the White or Grey lists] and also open tabs were ignored

reasonTabsWereNotIgnored.description: [Clean because of sub.google.com is not in the White or Grey lists] or in any open tabs

removeActivityLogEntryText.description: Remove Log Entry. Shown in summary activity log for individual log removal.

removeAllExpressionsConfirm.message:
Czy na pewno chcesz usunąć WSZYSTKIE ($expressionCount$) zapisane wyrażenia z ($listCount$) list(y)?

TO NIE MOŻE BYĆ COFNIĘTE!

Wpisz [ $expressionCount$ ] i kliknij OK, aby usunąć.
removeAllExpressionsConfirm.description:
Are you sure you want to remove ALL ($expressionCount$) saved expression(s) from ($listCount$) list(s)?

THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE!

Type [ $expressionCount$ ] and click OK to delete. Popup prompt if Delete All Expression is clicked.

removeListText.message: Usuń wszystkie formuły z wybranej listy
removeListText.description: Remove All Expressions from Selected List. Shown in List of Expressions, only on Firefox and if containers/contextual identities is enabled.

removeStorageCount.description: Removed $count$ item(s) from $storageType$. Used in manual localstorage clean notification.

resetCookieCounterText.description: Reset Cookie Counters. Button in Welcome Page.

restoreText.description: Restore. Restores cookies that was cleaned up by this extension. Found in Activity Log entries.

reviewLinkMessage.message: Dzięki za wypróbowanie $cadTitle$. Jeśli ci się podoba, proszę o recenzję.
reviewLinkMessage.description: Thanks for trying out Cookie AutoDelete. If you liked it, then please give a review.

serviceWorkersCleanupText.description: Enable Service Workers Cleanup (Firefox 77+, Chrome 74+). Found in CAD Settings.

serviceWorkersText.description: Service Workers. Primarily used in notifications.

sessionStorageText.description: SessionStorage. Used in manual localstorage clean notification

CAD.example: CAD - Short form of Cookie AutoDelete

showNumberOfCookiesInIconText.message: Pokaż liczbę ciasteczek dla tej domeny nad ikoną
showNumberOfCookiesInIconText.description: Show Number of Cookies for that Domain over the Icon

siteDataText.description: Site Data. Found in Activity Log Summary and Notifications.

sizePopupText.description: Size of Popup (in px). This sets the font size in the Popup.

sizeSettingText.description: Size of Setting Pages (in px). This sets the font size in the Setting Pages.

toGreyListText.message: Dodaj do szarej listy (czyść przy restarcie)
toGreyListText.description: Add to Greylist (Clean on Browser Restart)

toggleNotificationText.message: Przełącz, aby włączyć lub wyłączyć powiadomienia
toggleNotificationText.description: Toggle to enable or disable notifications

versionNumberText.description: $CAD$ version 3.2.1. The actual number is formatted differently and will be right below this text.

welcomeMessage.message: Cześć! W czasie tej sesji, $cadTitle$ usunął $sessionDeleted$ ciasteczek, a od instalacji $totalDeleted$.
welcomeMessage.description: Hi there! During this session, Cookie AutoDelete has deleted 123 cookies and in total 456 cookies.
